elementSpec.desc: describes any kind of relationship or linkage amongst a specified group of participants.
参加者間の関連性を示す．

attDef.desc: categorizes the relationship in some respect, e.g. as social, personal or other.
当該関係の分類を示す．例えば，社会的，個人的関係など．

valItem.gloss: relationship concerned with personal roles, e.g. kinship, marriage, etc.

attDef.desc: supplies a name for the kind of relationship of which this is an instance.
当該関係の名前を示す．
attDef.valDesc: an open list of application-dependent keywords

attDef.desc: identifies the active participants in a non-mutual relationship, or all the participants in a mutual one.
一方向の関係における主体的な参加者，または双方向の関係における全 参加者を示す．
attDef.valDesc: a list of identifier values for participant or participant groups

attDef.desc: supplies a list of participants amongst all of whom the relationship holds equally.
双方向の関係における参加者を示す．
attDef.valDesc: a list of identifier values for participant or participant groups

attDef.desc: identifies the passive participants in a non-mutual relationship.
一方向の関係における受動的な参加者を示す．
attDef.valDesc: a list of identifier values for participant or participant groups

remarks.p: Only one of the attributes active and mutual may be supplied; the attribute passive may be supplied only if the attribute active is supplied. Not all of these constraints can be enforced in all schema languages.
